column4: can someone help me to configure compiz-fusion, I installed the compiz-setting manager so I could customize the options, the graphic card i'm using is a radeon mobility m6 I set the desktops to 4 and tried replacing with emerald but neither emerald or compiz is working...fresh 7.10 install
I also turned on all third party sources but compiz is not working
what video card do you have?
are you using the radeon or fglrx driver?
xorg reads ATI Tech Radeon Mobility M6 Driver: ati
and what driver is it using?
sorry how can I determine that
do you get 3d acceleration with that driver? I think it should run compiz
sorry how can I determine that....it did not give an option for restricted drivers on my video card just for my modem
your card is probably much too old for fglrx
output is yes for direct rendering
i think it should work with compiz then
none of the settings are taking effect in compiz settings manager
i can't help much more, I don't use compiz or ati hardware
